name: DRP Soundtrack
description:
digital retro park - museum on a cart - the soundtrack 

This is a Game Boy ROM containing 10 songs from the "digital retro park - museum on a cart" project.
All songs written / ported by Tronimal.
Original songs by TSM, DeerTears & Tronimal.
Every song plays as an endless loop and has it's own song screen. Enjoy listening!

Don't forget to check out the original project at digitalretropark.net
If you'd like to hear more music - go to tronimal.bandcamp.com



*controls for html preview version above:
J = next song
K = prev song
ENTER = go to start
SHIFT = go to credits
